title: afk 2 out of 20 games and you get five 10 minute LP queues
body:
good on ya riot.


maybe i wouldnt have to afk if i didnt have a 4-bot game. 

im not arguing that i shouldnt be punished. just like black people accepted prison time for conducting peaceful protests.

but Johnson didnt fucking give them a life sentence. what the fuck is this imbalance. lmao riot youre just as bad as the white dominated system was back in the 1970s. fucking disgraceful

replies.body:
AFK'ing is actually *really* frustrating for the other players on your team, and even the opposing team often isn't cool with the unfair advantage they get. A handful of low priority queues is actually very little compared to the distress it causes everyone in your games; if you don't want to get a leaver penalty, play the matches you queue up for!

You can find more info on Leaver Buster here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ

> afk 2 out of 20 games

There are 10 players per game, and if everyone afk at that rate then on average every single game would have an afk on one side or the other. 

Every. Single. Game.
